# Using a Remote Release

A remote release can be used for long time-exposures. When using an optional RR-100 remote release or an electronic release from third-party suppliers, connect it to the camera’s microphone/remote release connector via a third-party ø2.5 mm to 3.5 mm adapter.

!Remote Release Connection

- A confirmation dialog will be displayed when a remote release is connected; press **MENU/OK** and select **REMOTE** for **MIC/REMOTE RELEASE**.

# Exposure Preview

To preview exposure in the LCD monitor, select **PREVIEW EXP./WB** for:

- **SCREEN SET-UP > PREVIEW EXP./WB IN MANUAL MODE**.

!Exposure Preview Example

- Select an option other than **PREVIEW EXP./WB** when using the flash or on other occasions on which exposure may change when the picture is taken.
